𒁍𒁍𒄿 palm of dates (𒁍 púˡ) 𒁍𒁍𒄿 palm : ration 𓂩

𓇜 𓏏 | date-palm | ϫⲁⲫⲁⲧ / ⲃⲏⲧ balahim palm-of-dates

𒁍𒁍𒄿 pú… phoenix ⲃⲁⲓ ⲛ.ⲂⲈⲚⲒ m. ~PALM~branch ↔ funchal ⲃⲉⲛⲓ f. date of palm-tree ↔ ⲥⲉⲣⲃⲛⲛⲉ thorn of date palm ⲃⲉϭⲏⲛ , -ϫⲏⲛ n. a rush: Binsen Bülten ~ ⲃⲉϭⲏⲛ << ++!!:?? ↔ Besen biegen !! ⲃⲉⲗϩⲱⲗ f. kind of date-palm unripe date; the fruit date bell↔bienroot ⲃⲏⲧ m. palm-leaf; f. rib Blatt bent Büschel ^^ ⲃⲉⲛⲓ™ Binsen Palme benroot! <<< ϫⲁⲫⲁⲧ pl. fibers of palm tree

ⲕⲁⲫⲁϫⲓ m. part of date-palm, litleaf of fiber, stump of branch

𓌳 𓄿 𓌳 𓄿 𓏲 𓆭 𓏨 | (pl.) dom-palms | ← 𓌳 𓌳 | dom-palm |

ϫⲁϭⲏ , pl. ϫⲁϭⲁⲩ f. left hand ϫⲉ m. spathe of date-palm

ϩⲛⲁⲩ m. flowering branch of palm

𒄑𒊷 zu2 #nimbar mu-nim-mar "date palm" <> 𒄑𒊷 ŠA₆ ĝešnimbar gešnimbar > 𒄑𒊷 gišimmaru gešimmar gšimmar خرما xormâ χουρμαδιά chourmadiá کھٔزٕر کُل khạzụr ਖਜੂਰ khajūr hurma xoma curmal 𒄑𒊷 gišimmaru gešimmar ge šimmar < ተምር tämər תַּמְרָא tamrā תמר tāmār ܬܡܪܬܐ tmarṯā … 𒄑𒊷 фи́никова fínikova φοῖνῐξ phoînix phoenix φοῖνῐξ bu.nix 𐀛 ni 𐘝 NI νικύλεον نَخْلَة naḵla
